text: Splendor in the Grass is a 1961 American film. It can also refer to: * Splendor in the Grass (1981 film), a 1981 television remake of the original film * Splendor in the Grass (album), a 2009 album by the American musical group Pink Martini ==See also== * Splendour in the Grass, an Australian music festival
title: Splendor in the Grass (disambiguation)
